mapper.insert: insert into t_role(role_name, create_date, note) value(#{roleName}, #{createDate}, #{note})
mapper.select: select id, role_name as roleName, create_date as createDate, note from t_role where id = #{id}
select id, role_name as roleName, create_date as createDate, note from t_role where role_name like concat('%', #{roleName}, '%')
